answerText: Tender is the Night[10] This Fitzgerald short story is about the spoiled Ardita Farnam, who is captured by the swashbuckling Curtis Carlyle while vacationing with her uncle in Florida.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Haverford and Michigan State B | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One scene in this book sees the protagonist remove the murdered body of Jules Peterson from Rosemary's bed, and later the protagonist's wife leaves him for Tommy Barban. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel that sees Rosemary Hoyt have an affair with Dick Diver, a work by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
